channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OK

item.description:
Report E-2023100395

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report E-2023100330
item.description:
Report E-2023100330

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-14T00:31:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: GLENPOOL
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal LTU experienced a UN1791 Extract-2 release from (2) 55-gallon poly drums. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 2-cups of product released to the drum lids of each drum due to loose bung caps. The released product was cleaned off the drums with absorbent rags and the caps were re-secured for shipment on. All impacted absorbent pads and PPE were containerized into a 45-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2023090948
item.description:
Report X-2023090948

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-19T15:12:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-18
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in the unload at NOKC 732 wet from a bottle of CloroxPro Germicidal Bleach Concentrated that had a loose cap. Package was placed into a red tote with a hazmat bag. DescribePack: Box was wet and ripped/torn open. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a red tote with a hazmat bag.
